      • convertValue

        public Object convertValue(edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.Expr pF)
        Description copied from class: FormulaCreator
        Convert the formula into a Java object as far as possible, i.e., try to match a primitive or simple type like Boolean, BigInteger, or Rational.

        If the formula is not a simple constant expression, we simple return null.

        Specified by:
        convertValue in class FormulaCreator<edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.Expr,edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.Type,edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.ExprManager,edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.Expr>
        Parameters:
        pF - the formula to be converted.

      • convertValue

        public Object convertValue(edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.Expr expForType,
                           edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.Expr value)
        Description copied from class: FormulaCreator
        Convert the formula into a Java object as far as possible, i.e., try to match a primitive or simple type.
        Overrides:
        convertValue in class FormulaCreator<edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.Expr,edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.Type,edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.ExprManager,edu.nyu.acsys.CVC4.Expr>
        Parameters:
        expForType - an additonal formula where the type can be received from.
        value - the formula to be converted.
